articles.title: Kim Jong Il Appreciates Concert
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Appreciates Concert
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated a concert given by artistes of the Unhasu Orchestra and other national art troupes on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Kim Jong Il warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the audience and warmly congratulated them on the Day of the Sun, the greatest national holiday.
					
					 The performance started with chorus "The Patriotic Song".
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as chorus and piano duet "Nostalgia", female trio and chorus "Mangyongdae, the Cradle of Revolution", male quartet and chorus "We Visit Mangyongdae", tale and music "The Leader's Noble Idea Blossoms", female solo "His Eternal Smile", male chorus "A Break at Working Place", female sextet "We Sing of Our Country Holding the Leader in High Esteem."  
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang high praises of the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea and father of the nation building. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the performers on their successful performance. 
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction with the wonderful concert rich in ideological contents and high in artistry, he extended thanks to them in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the entire army and all the people would work heart and soul as befitting soldiers and disciples of the President and build a thriving socialist nation on this land as early as possible and thus further glorify the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's Korea. 
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA Vice Marshal Kim Il Chol, member of the DPRK NDC, and other commanding officers of the KPA, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, leading officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA, officials of the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and working people of different strata.

articles.title: Fireworks Held
articles.content:
Fireworks Held 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The evening of fireworks commemorating the Day of the Sun "My Country Where the President's Wishes Have Become Reality" was held with splendor here on Wednesday evening.
					 The bank of the River Taedong facing the Tower of the Juche Idea and its adjourning streets were crowded with citizens from all walks of life who came to enjoy the significant evening of fireworks.
					
					 Among the spectators were senior officials of the party, army and state, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, heroes and those of merit.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas compatriots' delegations, overseas Koreans, foreign delegations and delegates and other foreign guests on a visit to the DPRK, diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in his speech said that the evening of fireworks was also provided thanks to the firm will and intense loyalty of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to enable the people to fully enjoy happiness in all aspects just as the fireworks to be displayed in the sky would present a scenery of all kinds of flowers and thus realize the lifetime desire of President Kim Il Sung without fail.
					
					 The evening of fireworks will demonstrate before the world the inexhaustible mental power and indomitable spirit of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to surely open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President, single-mindedly rallied around Kim Jong Il with the firm faith that the President is always with us, he stressed.
					
					 As the evening of fireworks began, fireworks were displayed in the sky above the Tower of the Juche Idea to the tune of the song "Great Torrent of Yearning".
					
					 Kaleidoscopic fireworks and a variety of rays turned the nocturnal sky as bright as day.
					
					 Seen in succession on the peculiar electronic displays set up in the middle of the river shrouded in wet fog were slogans "General Kim Il Sung Is Our Sun", "We Will Live Forever with the President", etc. and scenes showing the immortal revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and the stirring reality of Songun era, the prosperous era of the Workers' Party of Korea, in which the ideals of the people are coming true.
					
					 The venue of the evening was reminiscent of a grand festival where all kinds of flowers were in full bloom as fireworks of various colors and shapes turned the nocturnal sky more beautiful and laser, electronic lightings and other lighting arts reached the height of ecstasy. 
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, addressing the evening of fireworks at its end, stressed that the display of fireworks in April represented a gun-salute for an all-out charge to more dynamically push ahead with the on-going march for a great surge to radically improve the people's standard of living by putting spurs to the development of light industry and agriculture once again with the same vim and vigor with which they brought about a turning phase in the drive for building a thriving nation under the leadership of the great Party.
					
					 The evening of fireworks powerfully demonstrated the firm faith and will of the servicepersons and the people of the DPRK to successfully accomplish the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation, holding the President in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and remaining true to the Songun idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior Party and state officials, commanding officers of the Korean People's Army, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of the Party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung on Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 A floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK was laid before the statue of the President.
					
					 They made a bow towards the statue of the President in humble reverence. 
					
					 They paid homage to the President, a peerless patriot, peerlessly great man and benevolent father of the nation, in profound reverence. 
					
					 Anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of the KPA and people from all walks of life visited the memorial palace on the same day.
					
					 Meanwhile, the diplomatic corps, the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here and Director-General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea Vishwanath, Secretary General of the IIJI Kenichi Ogami and his party, delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea in different countries and regions, friendship and tourist visiting groups of China and other foreign guests, overseas Koreans' delegations and art troupes and other overseas Koreans and the chief and members of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front also visited the palace to pay homage to the President.

articles.title: Officials Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Officials Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairman of a friendly party and leading officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited Mangyongdae on Thursday, the Day of the Sun.
					 They looked back on the greatness of President Kim Il Sung who devoted everything to the liberation of Korea and its prosperity all his life and the noble careers of the members of the Mangyongdae family who steadfastly carried forward the tradition of the patriotic and revolutionary family generation after generation, while going round historic materials and mementoes on display at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 Then they visited the old home of the President and looked round the historic relics preserved there with good care.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il Conveys Sympathy to China
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il Conveys Sympathy to China
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Kim Yong Nam and Premier Kim Yong Il Thursday sent a message of sympathy to President of China Hu Jintao and Premier of the State Council Wen Jiabao as regards many casualties and material losses caused by a quake that hit Qinghai Province, China.
					The message, through the President and the Premier of China, expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the government and people of China, the victims and their families and sincerely hoped that the inhabitants in the quake-stricken area would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster as soon as possible and bring their living to normal under the leadership of the Communist Party and government of China.

articles.title: Reception for Chinese Visiting Group
articles.content:
Reception for Chinese Visiting Group
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A reception was given for a friendship and tourist visiting group of China on a visit to the DPRK by the State General Bureau of Tourism at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Thursday. 
					 Present there on invitation were members of the friendship and tourist visiting group of China led by Vice-Chairman of the National Tourism Administration Zhu Shanzhong, Chinese Ambassador Liu Hongcai and members of the Chinese embassy here. 
					
					 On hand were Director of the general bureau Kim To Jun and officials concerned. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Reception for Delegations of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Reception for Delegations of Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government gave a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Thursday in honor of the visiting delegations and delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Present there on invitation were Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, and his party and delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea in different countries and regions on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 On hand were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Kun Gwang, vice-chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, and officials concerned.
					
					 Yang, addressing the reception, said that President Kim Il Sung was the father of the nation and founder of socialist Korea who turned the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He extended thanks to Juche idea followers who have rendered invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of socialist construction and national reunification.
					
					 Vishwanath said in his speech that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, clearly indicating the path to be followed by humankind.
					
					 The President liberated the country, built a socialist state and dedicated his whole life to the happiness of the people, he said, adding:
					
					 The President will always live in the hearts of all people as he performed undying feats for the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Letter from AINDF
articles.content:
Letter from AINDF
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a letter by the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) Thursday, the Day of the Sun.
					 The revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung was a glorious history of a great revolutionary and a peerless patriot who performed undying feats in the struggle for carrying out the cause of independence of working people for 70 years with his distinguished wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and noble virtue which no other great man in the world can match, the letter said, and continued:
					
					 The President founded the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea, the acme of human wisdom, for the first time in history, thus brightly illumining the road to be followed by the times and humankind. He also defeated the formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialist enemies under the banner of Songun, thus strikingly demonstrating the dignity and might of the country and nation.
					
					 The President successfully solved the issue of succession to the leadership, foreseeing the future accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche with his clairvoyant wisdom, thus enabling the Korean nation to be blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation. This is shining as a feat of special mention as it provided a sure guarantee for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation and the future of a thriving nation.
					
					 The President, the world political elder, propounded the idea of global independence and ushered in the era of a fresh surge in the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. struggle, thereby positively encouraging progressive humankind in its dynamic struggle to build a peaceful and independent new world free from the imperialists' domination and subjugation by its concerted efforts.
					
					 It is thanks to your strong pluck and tested leadership that the DPRK, demonstrating its might as a political, ideological and military power, has remarkably strengthened the self-support and Juche character of its national economy on the basis of cutting-edge science and technology and effected a great revolutionary surge in the drive to make a decisive breakthrough toward the building of an economic power and the improvement of people's standard of living by dint of them.
					
					 We will work hard to defend and glorify the era of "By our nation itself" under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and thus open a new phase in the movement for independent reunification without fail, the letter concluded.

articles.title: Letter from Chongryon
articles.content:
Letter from Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated the usurped country, holding high the banner of Juche when Korea suffered an eclipse in the world map, and built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, a new world centred on the popular masses, the letter said, stressing that his feats are shining in the human history as miracles of the 20th century.
					
					 The President, who laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness, was a savior and a real father as he brought the Koreans in Japan the joy of the rebirth of the nation, provided them with honor, dignity and genuine patriotic life as overseas citizens of an independent and sovereign state and looked after them with care warmer than sunrays, it said, and went on:
					
					 As led by you, the DPRK emerged a politico-ideological power which has achieved the unbreakable single-minded unity, a military power with powerful war deterrent and a scientific and technological power pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology, overlooking the world after shattering all moves of the imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle it. 
					
					 Today the Koreans in Japan are fully confident of the truth of history that thanks to your leadership the undying feats of the President recorded in the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan always remain shining and a rosy future lies in following you.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan will devote patriotism and sincerity to building a thriving nation, contribute to the cause of national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself", thoroughly reject and frustrate the moves of the reactionaries against the DPRK and Chongryon through positive external activities and make contributions to promoting the friendship between the peoples of the DPRK and Japan and implementing the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration, the letter concluded.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung in different parts of the country on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the city visited the statue of the President on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen standing before the statue of the President was a floral basket from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces, power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA, organs at different levels, industrial establishments, farms, schools, etc. in the city and flowers were laid before the statue.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and youth and students paid tribute to the President in humble reverence. 
					
					 Floral baskets were also laid before the statues of the President at different units in the city.
					
					 Servicepersons of the KPA and people across the country laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of the President in their residential areas.
					
					 The military attaches corps here also laid a floral basket before the statue of the President on Mansu Hill on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid by Chinese Delegations
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid by Chinese Delegations
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower by delegations from the northeast area of China on Thursday, the Day of the Sun.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statue in boundless reverence for the President who performed undying feats for the strengthening and development of the DPRK-China friendship and the cause of global independence and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Performance for Guests of Honor Given
articles.content:
Performance for Guests of Honor Given
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Participant in the Second April Spring People's Art Festival gave a performance for guests of honor at the People's Palace of Culture, the Cultural Hall of the Ministry of Railways and the Music Hall of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory on Thursday. 
					 The performances were enjoyed by senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and working people in the city. 
					
					 Participants of the national festival of art agitation groups, the national festival of itinerant art squads and the national art festival of working people put on the stages colorful numbers. 
					
					 The performers warmly hailed the greatness of President 
					
					Kim Il Sung in such numbers as chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", a poem and chorus "Song of Loyalty". 
					
					 They reflected the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il who created the new history of perpetuating the memory of the President and has glorified the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's nation under the uplifted banner of Songun. 
					
					 Other colorful numbers which encourage the entire army and all the people to performing creation and feats drew the particular attention of the audience.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Groups
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Groups
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by members of art groups of the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace on Thursday to commemorate the 98th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among the audience were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C. of the youth league, and youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Repertoire included dances "Blooming April" and "To the Care of the General", duet "Photo", female chorus "My Country Is Dedicated by the Whole Life of the Generalissimo" and other colorful numbers.
					
					  Schoolchildren vividly represented their boundless longing and reverence for Kim Il Sung who gave all the precious things to the children, calling them "kings" of the country, and is indicating the rosy future with the beaming image of benevolent sun even today.
					
					 They also successfully depicted the happy life of the children in the era of Songun growing up with nothing to desire more in the world, keeping themselves knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy.

articles.title: Youth and Students Holds Dancing Parties
articles.content:
Youth and Students Holds Dancing Parties
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country on Thursday to commemorate the 98th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The dancing parties began with the playing of song "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" in such places of the capital city as plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 The youth and students danced to the tune of melodies of "Song of Mangyongdae", "Let's Sing of My Country Holding the Leader in High Esteem" and other songs with ardent yearning and in deep reverence for the President.
					
					 The atmosphere of the dancing parties gained in scope amid the playing of "Our General Is Best", "His Ideal" and other songs.
					
					 The dancers presented attractive and dynamic dance rhythms, dancing to the tune of "The Country and Youth Will Shine", "Let Us Meet at the Front" and other songs.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were also held in different parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Held
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations was held at the plaza of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace Thursday to commemorate the 98th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending there were representatives of the KCU from all provinces, schoolchildren in Pyongyang and pupils joining the KCU.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Jung Rin, Minister of Education Kim Yong Jin, leading officials of working people's organizations, officials concerned, officials of the youth league, war veterans, persons of merit and parents of pupils.
					
					 All the participants in the meeting paid tribute to the beaming image of the President with their ardent yearning and boundless reverence for him.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league, said in his report that the President made sure that the rising generations stoutly grew up to be genuine successors to the Juche cause while devoting his all to the happiness of posterity. His undying feats will be everlasting, Ri added.
					
					 He referred to the fact that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has protected the happiness of the schoolchildren across the country and taken care of them with his great devotion to translate the President's desire into reality.
					
					 The KCU's admission ceremony took place at the meeting.
					
					 Led by Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, pupils joining the KCU solemnly took their oath before the flags of the KCU.
					
					 Senior cadres, war veterans, persons of merit and officials of the youth league tied red neckerchiefs around the necks of the pupils and pinned KCU badges on their chests, congratulating them.
					
					 Then, war veteran Ri Ki Hwan, hero of the DPRK, Associate Prof. and Dr. Ju Chang Il, dean of a faculty of Kim Il Sung University, and Pae Gil Su, labor hero and people's sportsman, made congratulatory addresses.

articles.title: First-term Camping Starts
articles.content:
First-term Camping Starts
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The first-term camping of the year began at the children's camps in different parts of the country on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 It brought together the members of the Children's Union who distinguished themselves in study, organizational life and good conduct campaign. 
					
					 During the camping they will have an opportunity to deeply grasp the greatness of the peerlessly great persons and conduct mountaineering and visits and various other activities. 
					
					 A ceremony of receiving campers took place at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp on Thursday.
					
					  Similar ceremonies were held at the Songdowon International Children's Camp, the Yonphungho, Sohungho, Sokam and other children's camps of the country.
					
					 The campers spent pleasant first day of the camping, having colorful sports, cultural and amusement games.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated across Country
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated across Country
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Day of the Sun was significantly commemorated across the country.
					 Officials, working people and youth and students in different parts of the country visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung to lay floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before them. 
					
					 The venue of the 12th Kimilsungia Festival and Kimilsungia exhibitions in different provinces were pervaded with the Korean people's yearning for the President.
					
					 Theatres and halls in different parts of the country were crowded with people who came to enjoy art performances. 
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang high praises of the noble virtue of the President who devoted his whole life to the people. 
					
					 The workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex commemorated the Day of the Sun by giving art performance and holding sports games. 
					
					 The unionists of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and youth and students in Hyesan, Sariwon, Sinuiju and Kanggye cities presented performance of grand choruses. 
					
					 Mass gymnastic displays were held by school youth and children in Kaesong City and Phungso and Paechon counties.
					
					 Colorful sports and amusement games such as volleyball, Korean chess and Yut games were held in different units including the Musan Mining Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Life Resplendent with Internationalist Obligation
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Life Resplendent with Internationalist Obligation
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, an outstanding and great man, has been remembered in Korea and other countries on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 He founded the Juche idea in his early years to clarify the principles of class, national and human emancipation and, with a strong sense of internationalist obligation, made a great contribution to the progressives' cause of independence.
					
					 As early as the 1920s he organized a struggle against the Jilin-Hoeryong railway project of the Japanese imperialists to expose and frustrate their aggressive attempt on the mainland China. He consolidated the anti-Japanese united front between the Korean and Chinese people and supported the Soviet Union, the first socialist state, with arms and assisted the Chinese people during their civil war.
					
					 The President rendered sincere assistance to Cuba, Vietnam and Arab nations in their anti-imperialist struggle and to African countries in their struggle for national liberation from colonial rule.
					
					 He encouraged newly-liberated countries to develop in their own way by giving them every possible manner of support for their economic and cultural development and building of armed forces.
					
					 Korean technicians and specialists dispatched to tens of countries helped them build such economic establishments as power plants, factories, rural communities and irrigation setups, as well as cultural facilities. And cooperation in different fields promoted the building of a new society in developing countries.
					
					 The great life of the President, who made strenuous efforts for peace, justice and progress of the world, is kept in memory of tens of thousands of foreign people received in audience by him.   
					
					His great ideas on global independence and strong sense of international obligation have been carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun Editorially Commemorated
articles.content:
Day of Sun Editorially Commemorated 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK could shed its rays as a dignified socialist power and usher in a new great era of building a thriving nation, creating a heroic epic of world-startling creation and changes, as it has advanced under the banner of the Juche idea holding President Kim Il Sung in high esteem, say leading newspapers Thursday in editorials dedicated to the Day of the Sun.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the revolutionary history of the President is shining as the history of a peerlessly great man who performed undying feats in building a thriving socialist nation, weathering out stern tempests of the revolution under the uplifted banner of Juche.
					
					 The President pioneered and glorified the era of independence with his rare wisdom, tested leadership ability and noble virtue which no other great man in the world can match and with profound revolutionary theories and dynamic revolutionary practices and performed undying feats for the country and the nation and the cause of global independence. His revolutionary career was the one of a peerlessly great man, a great sage of revolution and the eternal sun of humankind.
					
					 The history has never known such a peerless patriot as the President who laid all foundations and provided all assets for achieving the prosperity of the nation from ashes and debris despite unprecedentedly stern and complicated ordeals.
					
					 His encyclopedic ideas and theories comprising politics, military affairs, economy, science and technology and all other fields serve as a banner for victory which energetically pushes forward the Korean revolution generation after generation.
					
					His cause of building a thriving nation of Juche is being successfully carried forward under the experienced and tested guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Steadfast is his faith and will to glorify Kim Il Sung's Korea prospering thanks to the President's ideas and exploits no matter how much water may flow under the bridge. 
					
					 The cause of building a thriving nation is sure to be crowned with a final victory as Kim Il Sung wishes the Korean people a happy future and the WPK, an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, leads the drive for a great surge and the servicepersons and people have turned out as one to work miracles in hearty response to the call of the party.
					
					 Minju Joson says that all the servicepersons and people will surely turn Songun Korea which sheds its rays thanks to the undying revolutionary careers of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their revolutionary feats into a thriving socialist nation of Juche and thus glorify the honor of Kim Il Sung's nation blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.

articles.title: Struggle for Democracy and Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Democracy and Reunification Called for in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- An "all-people memorial service for martyr Kim Ju Ryol for defending democracy and carrying forward his spirit" was held in Masan, South Kyongsang Province of south Korea on April 11.
					 The speakers recalled at the service that student Kim Ju Ryol was killed by fascist maniacs while struggling for bringing down the dictatorial regime and achieving democracy during the "March 15 fraudulent election" 50 years ago.
					
					 This marked an occasion in expanding the struggle against the dictatorial regime, they added.
					
					 Noting that this year marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the 50th anniversary of the April 19 Uprising and the 30th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Resistance, they declared that on these occasions the people would wage more dynamic actions for achieving the democracy of the society and the country's reunification.
					
					 At the end of the service, the participants staged a demonstration, chanting slogans "Let us defend democracy by carrying forward the spirit of the martyr!" and "Let us reunify the country by carrying forward the spirit of the martyr!"

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Holds Meeting
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Holds Meeting
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 14 to commemorate the 98th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending it were officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including Chief Vice-Chairman of the Central Standing Committee Ho Jong Man and Koreans in Japan including Korean youth and students. 
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report said that the exploits the President performed by enabling the Koreans in Japan to lead a worthy life, demonstrating before the world their honor of being pioneers in the world movement of overseas compatriots would always go down along with the history of the country. 
					
					He referred to the fact that General Secretary Kim Jong Il, a creditable successor to the noble idea and cause of the President, has wisely led the work of Chongryon in every period and at each stage.
					
					The reporter declared that the Koreans in Japan would protect Chongryon, the precious legacy of the President, to the last and consolidate it to be an organization of overseas Koreans single-mindedly united with the patriotic spirit and a powerful body of compatriots grouping broad strata of Koreans in Japan. 
					
					The Koreans in Japan will turn out in a dynamic struggle for achieving national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself," thoroughly frustrate the moves of the reactionaries against the DPRK and Chongryon and make a positive contribution to promoting the friendship between the peoples of the DPRK and Japan and implementing the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration, the reporter noted.  
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Il from the Chongryon Central Standing Committee was adopted at the meeting.
					
					   A lecture was given at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo that day under the sponsorship of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee. The attendants listened to the recorded lecture "Our leader, the eternal benefactor of the compatriots in Japan."

articles.title: Order Conveying Ceremony Held in Russia
articles.content:
Order Conveying Ceremony Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A ceremony for conveying Order of "Defender of Justice and Peace" presented by the Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill" to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was held at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on April 13.
					 Present there were President Oleg Oleinik and members of the leadership of the federation, and the DPRK ambassador to Russia and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the full-length portrait of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The order was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador at the ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in pamphlet by the Khabarovskaya Krayevaya Tipografia Publishing House of Russia on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 It also elucidates the tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on the basis of the three charters for national reunification.

articles.title: Great Unity of Whole Nation Supported in Nigeria
articles.content:
Great Unity of Whole Nation Supported in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a statement on April 7 in support of the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation.
					 The statement recalled that President Kim Il Sung published work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" on April 6, 1993, adding that the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo are the three charters for national reunification in which the President comprehensively clarified the fundamental principle and ways for the country's reunification.
					
					 The committee is confident that the above-said 10-point programme serves as a banner for Korea's reunification, the statement added.
					
					 The statement noted that the followers of the Juche idea in Nigeria recognize that the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. is urgent for ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, expressing full support for the DPRK's proposal for an early start of the talks to this end.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days in April Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days in April Observed 
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings, book and photo exhibitions and a film show took place in Romania, Mexico and Bangladesh on April 6 and 7 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 78th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books and photos on their undying exploits.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said that Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea, ushering in the era of independence, the new era in the human history, and took warm care of the people as the father of the great family of the country, regarding it as his lifetime maxim to believe in people as in Heaven.
					
					 He expressed confidence that thanks to the KPA led by Kim Jong Il, defender of global independence, Korean-style socialism is invincible and the DPRK will emerge a great prosperous and powerful nation envied by the world in the near future.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico stressed that Kim Il Sung is a great statesman and outstanding strategist who has led the party, army, state and people of the DPRK along the road of victory under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il has defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country by frustrating the imperialists' offensive to stifle the DPRK with his Songun revolutionary leadership and energetically led the struggle of the Korean people to realize the behests of the President.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched the Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia el concierto por el Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia el concierto por el Dia del Sol
						
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio el concierto ofrecido en ocasion del Dia del Sol por los artistas de la Orquesta Unhasu y otras entidades artisticas centrales.
					  Al responder cordialmente a los espectadores que le daban aclamaciones entusiastas, felicito calurosamente a ellos que conmemoran el Dia del Sol, suprema fiesta nacional.
					
					  En la escena de la funcion iniciada con el coro "Himno nacional" se pusieron variadas piezas, entre otras, el coro y duo de piano "Nostalgia", el trio femenino y coro "Mangyongdae, cuna de la revolucion", el cuarteto masculino y coro "Para visitar Mangyongdae", la narracion y musica "Materializado con exito el gran proposito del Lider", el solo femenino "Eterna sonrisa del Presidente", el coro masculino "Descanso en el lugar del trabajo" y el sexteto femenino "Cantemos nuestra patria dirigida por el Lider".
					
					  Mediante el concierto los ejecutantes cantaron con emocion las inmortales proezas del Presidente     Kim Il Sung, fundador de la Corea socialista y del Estado.
					
					  El Dirigente respondio a los ejecutantes y espectadores que le dan aclamaciones entusiastas y felicito sus exitos logrados en la representacion artistica.
					
					  Expreso gran satisfaccion de que hayan efectuado el excelente concierto con alto caracter ideo-artistico y dio agradecimiento en nombre del CC del PTC.
					
					  Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que todo el ejercito y el pueblo levantaran lo mas pronto posible la gran potencia prospera socialista en el pais, la patria dedicando todo lo suyo como soldados y discipulos del Presidente y exaltaran la dignidad y el honor de Corea de Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Vieronla tambien el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Il Chol, miembro del CDN de la RPDC, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito, los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC incluyendo los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam y los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades de masas, los ministerios e instituciones centrales, los oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular, los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, asi como trabajadores de distintos sectores.

articles.title: Tiene lugar velada de fuegos artificiales por el Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Tiene lugar velada de fuegos artificiales por el Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar solemnemente ayer por la noche en esta capital la velada de fuegos artificiales "Mi pais donde se lleva a la realidad el anhelo del Presidente" dedicada al Dia del Sol (15 de abril, dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					En la zona riberena del rio Taedong y las aceras adyacentes al Monumento a la Idea Juche estaban repletas de los capitalinos de diferentes sectores ansiosos por contemplar la velada de fuegos artificiales de mucha significacion.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica y prensa e informacion, los heroes y los benemeritos.
					
					Entre los invitados se distinguian las delegaciones de los coreanos residentes en ultramar y los compatriotas radicados en el extranjero, los huespedes extranjeros que visitan a Corea formando delegaciones o individualmente, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los delegados de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					El secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, dijo en su discurso que esta velada fue preparada segun la ferrea voluntad y la noble fidelidad del Dirigente Kim Jong Il de realizar sin falta el anhelo de toda la vida del Presidente Kim Il Sung al facilitarle al pueblo coreano las felicidades de todos los colores como los que hay en los fuegos artificiales a ser lanzados al cielo.
					
					La velada de esta noche manifestara a todo el mundo la inagotable potencia espiritual y el temperamento indoblegable de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de abrir, cueste lo que cueste, en el ano 2012, ano del centenario de natalicio del Presidente, las puertas de la gran potencia prospera, uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Insigne General del Songun, con la firme conviccion de que el Presidente estara para siempre junto con nosotros, apunto.
					
					Iniciada la velada, se lanzaron al cielo sobre el Monumento a la Idea Juche los cohetes, mientras repercutia la cancion "Mar grande de anoranza", y las chispas formaron un mundo maravilloso de luces.
					
					En el telon acuifero acondicionado originalmente en el medio del rio Taedong con neblinas provenientes del surtidor se veian las frases proyectadas como "El General Kim Il Sung es nuestro sol" y "Viviremos siempre junto con el Lider" y se proyectaban las imagenes de iluminacion electrica que mostraban las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la orgullosa realidad de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo en prosperidad y de la del Songun en que se realizan los ideales del pueblo.
					
					Parecia un gran festival de flores la sede de velada adornada con la lluvia de fuegos artificiales de diversas formas y colores, la iluminacion de laser y la electronica.
					
					Al finalizar la velada, Kim Ki Nam enfatizo que las estruendosas salvas lanzadas al cielo nocturno de abril devienen las detonaciones de la ofensiva general para acelerar con mas dinamismo la marcha de gran auge de hoy para mejorar trascendentalmente la vida del pueblo dando otro acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura con el impetu con que ha abierto la coyuntura decisiva de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera bajo la guia del gran partido. 
					
					La velada manifesto patentemente la firme conviccion y la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de cumplir con brillantez la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera enalteciendo al Presidente Kim Il Sung como el Sol eterno del Juche y apoyando con fidelidad la idea y la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il mediante el Songun.

articles.title: Condecorados los adeptos a la idea Juche
articles.content:
Condecorados los adeptos a la idea Juche
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 14 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las ceremonias de otorgamiento de ordenes, medallas y titulo de doctor de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a los partidarios de la idea Juche.
					En la ocasion fue concedida la Orden de Amistad de la RPDC de segunda clase al secretario general del Instituto Latinoamericano para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, Ramon Jimenez Lopez, quien contribuyo a la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo mediante sus dinamicas actividades para el estudio y la divulgacion de dicho pensamiento.
					
					Igualmente, fue conferida la Medalla de Amistad de la RPDC a otros 5 adeptos.
					
					Lyne Sinyodyium, miembro del Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche de Francia, y D. Narantuya, miembro de la Asociacion Paektusan para el Desarrollo Independiente de Mongolia, recibieron el titulo de doctor en la sociopolitica.

articles.title: Rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung en Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
articles.content:
Rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung en Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, los cuadros del partido y el Estado, los miembros de mando del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales rindieron tributo el dia 15 al Presidente Kim Il Sung ante su estatua de pie y su cuerpo en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					Ante la estatua estaba colocado un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El mismo dia, hicieron otro tanto los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y trabajadores de distintos sectores.
					
					Lo hicieron tambien el Cuerpo Diplomatico, el de Agregados Militares, los representantes de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, el director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche (IIIJ) Vishwanath, el secretario general del IIIJ Kenichi Ogami y su comitiva, las delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones  de estudio de la idea Juche de varios paises y regiones, los grupos de visita de amistad y del dominio turistico de China, otros huespedes extranjeros, las delegaciones y grupos artisticos de coreanos en ultramar, los compatriotas que viven en otros paises, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y otros miembros de esta entidad.

articles.title: Cuadros del partido y el Estado visitan Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Cuadros del partido y el Estado visitan Mangyongdae
						
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 15 Mangyongdae, tierra natal del Presidente            Kim Il Sung.
					Viendo los datos y objetos historicos exhibidos en el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae, los visitantes recordaron una vez mas la noble personalidad del Presidente, quien dedico toda su vida por la liberacion y la prosperidad de la patria, y la valiosa vida de los familiares de Mangyongdae quienes mantuvieron firmemente de generacion en generacion su patriotica y revolucionaria costumbre familiar.
					
					En la casa natal del Presidente, ellos vieron con gran emocion los objetos historicos conservados alli.
